text-node.description: Create payment instrument and handle transaction using PayPal ExpressCheckout flow

decision-node.description: If we have already Payment Instrument with token, that means we already have initialted paypal flow (e.g Express Checkout from cart)

text-node.description: Authorizes a payment using a DoExpressCheckout API call. The payment is authorized by using the PAYPAL_EXPRESS processor only and save the transaction ID.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Just set transaction ID and processor
